remarks: Properties that determine an extended metric.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
statement:
isxmetd.0 $e |- ( ph -> X e. _V ) $.
isxmetd.1 $e |- ( ph -> D : ( X X. X ) --> RR* ) $.
isxmetd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. X /\ y e. X ) ) -> ( ( x D y ) = 0 <-> x = y ) ) $.
isxmetd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. X /\ y e. X /\ z e. X ) ) -> ( x D y ) <_ ( ( z D x ) +e ( z D y ) ) ) $.
isxmetd $p |- ( ph -> D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) $.
